title: NSW Central Coast Apartment-Style Waterfront Escape Just 90 Minutes from Sydney
description: Your dreams of beachfront bliss will come true on the tranquil shores of Ettalong Beach on New South Wales' Central Coast - just a 90-minute drive from Sydney. This captivating destination offers a wealth of natural wonders, from national parks and lush forests, to unspoiled beaches and an abundance of native wildlife. Immerse yourself in the enchanting coastal lifestyle from a collection of self-contained suites with all the comforts of home.
offer_address: 53 The Esplanade, Ettalong, New South Wales 2257, Australia
